TopicTitle: KSP Console: not loading the craft from the VAB/Hangar onto the launchpad/runway

Articles.Content:
So this has been driving me up the wall, the ONLY time I have ragequit the game because it took me well over an hour just to load two crafts I needed to test.

 

So I design a craft, save it and launch but when the launch loads it loads a previous craft I had made earlier in the day. Here is a video of me opening the saved craft only for an entirely different one to be loaded up!! 
 

im new to the forums so if I’m not in the right place feel free to let me know
